Tutorials¶

Clustering¶

For getting started, we recommend Quanp’s implementation CharacterisingCompaniesBasedOnFinancialMetricsDuringCovid19 for S&P500 member companies, containing preprocessing, clustering and the identification of features that defined a group/cluster of companies.

Factor Analysis¶

This tutorial shows analyse and visualize the underlying features in each principle component/factor.
